name: SaveKnight
description:
Jump into your mom's computer to save YOUR data before the battery runs out. Will you manage to get to the hard disk, or will the battery run out first?

Computers don't save their data in order, they jump from one file to another... at least this one does. Therefore you 'll have to switch between two different worlds to get to you goal - the hard disk. 

A dead end in one world could be a new opportunity in the other!

Controls of the Game

You can play with keyboard or controller:

  • Left and Right Arrow keys / Left Stick: to Move
  • Space button / A or B button: to Jump
  • X key / X or Y button: to Switch between files
  •  Down Arrow key / Trigger button: to Crouch

Collab

This Game was done with a Collab between me as a Coder and my brother as an Artist and Songwriter for the Ludwig Jam 2021
